game_description: Welcome to LFF Expanded, part of BFI London Film Festival. Venture below the Thames to visit The Expanse, BFI London Film Festivalâ€™s XR and immersive showcase. Featuring over 15 different experiences alongside live events and short film screenings, talks, and even a few live shows! The LFF Expanded programme features 360 videos and fully immersive, interactive experiences. The 65th BFI London Film Festival runs 6-17 October 2021. Book tickets and find out about other free events here: https://www.bfi.org.uk/london-film-festival
